name: Sonic the Douchehog
description:
A funny, non-serious, dating sim with Sonic the Hedgehog.

It will get added with more content, but not very frequently as I cringe a lot while making it XD

I hope you enjoy getting kidnapped by a hedgehog ;)

(This is a big WIP, and none of the images nor audio belongs to me, the only thing that is mine are the ideas)
